name: Imagination Round Neck Steel Grey M6TS4414SG
description:
This T-shirt from Mark6 is the perfect combination of style and comfort. Made from 100% cotton material, this T-shirt features a round neck with trendy multi-colored pigment print on the front.
  • Brand name print
  • Round neck
  • Half sleeves
  • Cotton fabric
  • Regular fit
Team this T-shirt with washed jeans and ankle boots for a jaunty look.
material:
• 100% Cotton
  • Warm machine wash
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Warm iron
  • Dry cleanable
